freemarkerTextToGlueTransformer.freemarkerTemplate: <#list rows as row> <#assign countryId>${row["ISO-alpha3 Code"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign countryName>${row["Country or Area"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign m49Code>${row["M49 Code"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign regionName>${row["Region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign regionId>${regionName?lower_case}</#assign> <#assign subRegionName>${row["Sub-region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign subRegionId>${subRegionName?lower_case?replace(' ','_')?replace('-','_')}</#assign> <#assign intermediateRegionName>${row["Intermediate Region Name"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign intermediateRegionId>${intermediateRegionName?lower_case?replace(' ','_')?replace('-','_')}</#assign> <#assign ldc>${row["Least Developed Countries (LDC)"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign lldc>${row["Land Locked Developing Countries (LLDC)"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign sids>${row["Small Island Developing States (SIDS)"]?trim}</#assign> <#assign developmentStatus>${row["Developed / Developing Countries"]?trim?lower_case}</#assign> <#if countryId != ''> create custom-table-row m49_country "${countryId}" custom-table-row m49_country "${countryId}" set field full_name "${countryName}" <#if m49Code != ''> set field m49_code "${m49Code}" </#if> <#if regionId != ''> set link-target m49_region "custom-table-row/m49_region/${regionId}" </#if> <#if subRegionId != ''> set link-target m49_sub_region "custom-table-row/m49_sub_region/${subRegionId}" </#if> <#if intermediateRegionId != ''> set link-target m49_intermediate_region "custom-table-row/m49_intermediate_region/${intermediateRegionId}" </#if> <#if ldc == 'x'> set field is_ldc true <#else> set field is_ldc false </#if> <#if lldc == 'x'> set field is_lldc true <#else> set field is_lldc false </#if> <#if sids == 'x'> set field is_sids true <#else> set field is_sids false </#if> set field development_status "${developmentStatus}" exit </#if> </#list>
